mapper.select: select id,year,name,description,status,start_time,end_time,create_time,create_user,update_time,update_user,udef1,udef2,udef3,udef4,udef5,udef6,udef7,udef8,udef9,udef10 from activity_info where id=#{id} AND platform_id = #{platformId}
mapper.delete: delete from activity_info where id=#{id} AND platform_id = #{platformId}
